word: Camp meetings are to be held; not one mammoth camp meeting, but small camp meetings in different localities. After the camp meeting is over, let a house be hired for the accommodation of the workers, and let these workers go out among the people and ascertain who are willing to take their position on the Lord's side. One thing is certain:  We have a work to do similar to the work done in the early history of the message. This work we are trying to carry forward in this country [Australia].
